ComicInfo.Summary:
Probe fights to keep Dutch Abe from destroying the downed UFO. Abe's men attempt at blowing up the saucer results in it emitting a death killing everyone except Probe and Simon. Probe enters the saucer and finds it devoid of life but it appears that the explosion may have also triggered an SOS signal.
Whitey takes control of the weather controls of Mega-City One to try to escape from prison.
